review_text: My skin is normal to dry and sensitive & I do have some scars of dead acne. I tried this product without prime and concealer to know how it sits on my skin and how much blurring effect it can give. Its light coverage foundation. To build medium coverage you need to take good amount of foundation. It doesn't hide any marks or spots on its own by its first application. But that's what we want for our daily use. It's very light weight formula and doesn't feel like a layer on skin. Very easy to blend and feels like skin. Excellent product for daily use and for all the working ladies. It's definitely hydrating and doesn't feel caky at all. It definitely serves what it claims. Talking about this shade...it's very slightly darker for my skin tone. It's sort of inclined towards orangish-peachy shade while I am more sort of pale. Since it's recently launched you can't use this on findation.com site to find your foundation shade. I would definitely buy a shade lighter than this. I cannot find any daily foundation with so much quantity and at such a reasonable price. Katrina really solved our daily problem by launching this hydrating light weight foundation üòÉüòÉ A big no for oily skin peeps...people with combination can go for it and set their oily regions with translucent powder or compact. Excellent for daily use only. Not for glam look at all. Super hydrating & Not matte. Easy blendable. Teens can try this too.

review_title: One of the best lip liner that I have seen
review_text: It is one of the best lip liner that I have bought so far. Got a freebie with this liner in the shade "applause". Had bought a bunch of kay beauty stuff that's why the freebie. Glides smoothly, nice pigmentation. Great and blends well with nude/natural shade lipsticks. Not so drying. Need a sharpener otherwise it looks like a stub. I love nude shades and these two shades go well with almost all my lipsticks. Definitely a good choice and happy to see such a nice brand thriving in India. Will buy again but lasts long. Pls keep the outer packaging to note the expiration date. No issues so far. And is easily removable with a good cleansing balm/ makeup remover.

review_text: I have used this hair colour for about 6 times in last 2 years. This was my first hair colour and it had no damaging effect what so ever. It makes hair shiny, smooth and imparts a beautiful shine. Doesn't colour hair perfectly in the first go. Have to apply it second time, and then the colour looks beautiful. Absolutely gorgeous colour. Most of the times people don't even figure out I have coloured my hair by myself. Go for it, it's my only trusted hair colour. Way less damaging than what they do in salons.

review_title: Finally an affordable foundation for dry skin!
review_text: The foundation is amazing. It is hydrating as the name suggests. It gives natural coverage which can be builded upto medium. But for those like me, who wants a natural look, this is what you are looking for! It doesn't give you a dewy look or too much shine. Just a natural barely there glow. Although i would suggest a hydrating primer before it if you have very dry skin like me. Believe me, the extra hydration doesn't hurt. The color was a perfect match for me.( I realised that I was using wrong matches till now, i thank the choice of shade to the extremely helpful sales assistant at the nykaa luxe store) . As for the staying power, it stayed for good 6 hours with a busy schedule in the hot and sweaty summer. That reminds me, Kay beauty, you took so much consideration for Indian skin tones, how could you forget Indian summer?? No SPF? And that's a huge drawback. But if you don't mind applying a separate layer of sunscreen, and you have dry skin, you have found your holy grail.

Much like a cooler tint of pink. SUITABILITY : Although this shade can suit all Indian skin tones, but it better suits fairer tones. TEXTURE : As the name goes, the lipstick is smooth as satin. It just glides across the lips and feels very smooth and creamy when applied. It DOES NOT feel sticky or heavy on the lips. TRANSFER : It is not very long lasting and smudges easily. Only con is that it needs to be sharpened but I like it so much that I don't mind it. I will definitely repurchase. The orange corrector pencil, and this contour stick pencil are now added to my go-to products.

review_text: I bought the shade Soft Spoken after waiting for months for it to come back in stock. I'd read tons of reviews and swatch details about this shade so in spite of being a little apprehensive of how this shade would look on my lips, I went ahead and bought it anyway. It's a beautiful pink-toned nude shade and it applies like a dream. These liquid lipstick really do feel like liquid suede. They take about a minute to dry completely and then they're smooth and transfer-proof. The lipstick stays a good seven to eight hours if you don't have any heavy meals in between and even if you do, they start fading evenly from the inner aspect of the lips so slight touch-ups might be needed. All in all, this is a great product and I'm glad I made the purchase.

review_text: I started using bb creams as a normal face cream and my first purchase was maybelline and it fairly did it work and then they changed their packaging and i had to switch for another bb cream that's where i came across this baby... trust me when i call it baby i mean it because L'oreal bb cream deserves the best review. Staying power is good, gives an instant glow because of Hyaluronic acid and covers minor dark spots and pigmentation. Remember it's not a concealer or foundation so don't expect to get all spots covered. This bb cream changed my life and i got so addicted to this product because i just didn't needed anything else on my face and then L'oreal stopped it's production (fyi, i have already raised a complaint cum request to them about restocking) But if you guys ever see this product then buy it and notify me as well. And offcourse thanks to Nykaa for selling this and also Nykaa if you are reading this, i need this product so if you have it in stock then please notify me because I'm waiting here to buy it.

So beware when you're eating some oily stuff. For the same reason one can't apply any moisturizer before application of this lip colour. The shade gets darker after it becomes dry. review_text: Found this shampoo to be gentle and pleasant smelling. Creamy formula leaves hair soft without causing any dryness. Since it's a creamy formula it doesn't cause any hair breakage while washing due to dryness. After using this shampoo, my hair feels really soft, bouncy and shiny to touch. However, my only con with this shampoo is it doesn't magically stop hair fall as it claims. While it does prevent further hair fall and prevents hair breakage and in this way is better than other shampoos but in no way, it would make your hair grow or stop your hair fall at once. But then it's very rare to find a shampoo that can stop hair fall altogether. There are only shampoos that cause more or shampoos that cause less hair fall. For hair fall issue, I have found, serums, lotions, and oils are the best solution as they tend to stay on your scalp for longer to work their magic. So if you're looking for a shampoo that prevents hair fall due to breakage and dryness or one that causes lesser hair fall, go for this one!

review_text: I have tried the shade Baddest Beige from this line, which my sister got for me from the states, but now it's almost over. Last night, I randomly opened my Nykaa app and saw the broadcasting of this and I almost choked on my water. I was so happy to know that I can finally repurchase that shade that, Jaclyn Hill raves about constantly too, and also try the other ones... but when I saw the lack of nudes and the shade names. I was taken aback. None of the shade names matches with the ones that SO MANY YouTubers have made swatch videos for. Like, for example, We have here, the shade Mauve Mayhem while other countries, have it as Spicy Mauve. Seriously, NONE of the shades matches. Idk if these are counterfeit products or if they've made a separate shade range for Indian skin tones, and I'd really like to be reassured so I can actually buy a few. But just for the record, These are highly pigmented. They're like a hybrid of a lipgloss and lipstick but in a tube. They don't last very long but keep your lips moisturized because of the oils in it. They glide smoothly and have a really soft texture. They look even better once you layer: first with a lip liner, then the lipstick and lastly, top it off with a gloss.

review_text: Oily and Combination skin types STAY AWAY!!!! My skin type: Combination (T-zone is oily and have few dry patches in the corners of of mouth), have large pores on my cheeks. Shade References: I am in between 230 Natural Buff and 310 Sand beige in Fit Me L'oreal Fresh Wear 260 Golden Sun suits me perfectly Milani Conceal and Perfect 06 Sand Beige is a good match I ordered this foundation on Women's day sale @‚Çπ1050 (10% off). I received the delivery within 48hrs. Since that time I am trying this foundation everday. The shade 155YTan is little darker for my complexion. 145NMedium will be a better match. Pros: This foundation is very light weight, doesn't feel heavy, feels like second skin, sheer to buildable medium coverage, demi matte finish, doesn't transfer a lot, wide shade range to choose from. Cons: after 2-2¬Ω hrs of wearing it emphasises the pores, after 3-4 hrs starts clinging on to dry patches, makes skin very oily and sweaty, oxidises 1-1¬Ω on oily combination skin. It will become a holy grail foundation for dry to normal skin people. But Oily and Combination skin people places think before investing your money.

review_text: The product is light to medium buildable coverage. You can have a sheer coverage with just one layer or you can layer 2 more times to build it up wherever you need more coverage. Since it is a very runny formula, please build it up slowly so that you are not left with uneven streaks or lines on the face. It is good for normal to dry skin which provides a beautiful natural glow to the skin. It has SPF 45 that is enough to protect skin from the sun. I prefer using a dense brush to get maximum effect. Since it is a dewy foundation it does transfer if you do not set it with loose powder or compact. This foundation does not oxidize on my skin at all. This foundation will not work well for extremely oily skin. Even if you have combination skin this foundation is not a good choice in very hot summer days when you are out in the sun or sweating a lot. This product will give you a nice glow and leave your skin dewy and healthy looking. But if you sweat a lot or produce too much oil, the foundation will wear off your skin easily and make you look more sweaty. Dry to normal skin beauties can use it any time of the year they want.

review_text: OMG! This is an absolutely wonderful liquid lipstick by nyx. I bought this one is the shade 'Vintage'/'Retro'. This is a Mauve kind of shade with a brown muddy undertone which completely justifies the shade's name. The staying power is not that great when compared to Miss Claire's liquid lipstick trust me! But the texture of this one is lighter then the Miss Claire's one. Even the staying power is not that great or something and you may have to reapply it after a meal or after a few hours. One stroke application is enough and also the color can be built up by two or three strokes. The shade is very opaque. Now about me, I have a skin tone one shade darker than Bipasha Basu's current skin tone, a dusky one basically but its not dull. And the shade goes good on me. It looks mauve-ish (lol) but I guess it will ROCK on any Indian skin tone. So it's a safe safe shade. Some might feel its too pricey as the staying power n the quantity we get is not worth 850 bucks I swear. But the shades are wonderful and NYX and Nykaa are trustable ;) can give it a try. I'm also looking forward to try Cherry Skies and Stone Fox(idk abt the latter, not pretty sure. I love this one. So even if i state some cons above I'm gonna rate it 5 stars!

review_text: This variant of conditioner aims at hydrating the hair. It has no parabens, colorants or gluten. It is lightweight in texture and milky white brownish tint to it. The smell is mildly coconut and fruity. The antioxidants help in purification and renewal of hair. It is safe for color treated hair as well. Use it after every shampoo wash by gently massaging it is every strand of hair for curly hair scrunch the conditioner in your hair and let it sit for half n hour. After you wash you will get silky shiny hair which won't easily break. The frizz will be gone and hair and scalp will be nourished thoroughly. Use it twice a week for best results.

review_title: Best try if you have never tried highlights before
review_text: I have got knee length long hair and naturally smooth and straight hair but my hair is very thin so I was always scared of hair colouring. So I gave this highlight a try only coloured my front two locks to see how it goes, and trust me its amazing. If you are scared of bleach, then u can go for this product as it is not harsh at all, it doesn't burn the colour of your hair like bleach does it maintains the smooth texture of natural hair. This particular colour isn't vibrant but a ver subtle sunkissed brown which looks really very descent. I can assure you guys for a safe try because it is amazing and far better than other hair colors which u can do at home like streax. For best results, don't use the applicator given with the pack, instead use hair colouring brush take strips of desired hair and paint and wrap in a foil paper keep it for around 1 and a half hours and give some heat with a blow dryer. Remember: if your hair is previously chemical or colour treated this product may not develop the colour on you, especially if you have black coloured your hair.
